dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.
dependencies.name: perl

dependencies.description:
ExtUtils::MakeMaker - Create a module Makefile. This utility is designed
to write a Makefile for an extension module from a Makefile.PL. It is
based on the Makefile.SH model provided by Andy Dougherty and the
perl5-porters.
dependencies.name: perl-extutils-makemaker

dependencies.description:
Test2 is a new testing framework produced by forking Test::Builder,
completely refactoring it, adding many new features and capabilities.
dependencies.name: perl-test-more

dependent_to.description: HTTP::Tiny: A small, simple, correct HTTP/1.1 client perl module
dependent_to.name: perl-http-tiny

dependent_to.description: Moo - Minimalist Object Orientation (with Moose compatibility)
dependent_to.name: perl-moo

description: Carp - alternative warn and die for modules
name: perl-carp

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
